headline: A Technical Flub, and a Heroic Save: Recording a Fugitive for ‘The Daily’
abstract: The perils of reporting with a fancy new recorder.
lead_paragraph: “The Daily” asks a lot of our newsroom colleagues. Take Ben Dooley, our guest on Tuesday’s show about the fugitive businessman Carlos Ghosn, who escaped house arrest in Tokyo and emerged, a free man, in Beirut.
